amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the account for EERE by $166,143,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for EERE by $166,143,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 305 (Roll no. 551).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 305 (Roll no. 551).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. McClintock.
